obe gramaye di sapa laddo wannahu ya. 17 ‚Äùobe pasata da piti anana bandunata da sapa labenne ya. 18 ‚Äùobe darusampathata da bhawabhogasampathata da gawasampathata ha elu batalu patawunta da sapa labenne ya. 19 ‚Äùoba ena wita da yana wita da sapa laddo wannahu ya. 20 ‚Äùobe napuru kriyawalin oba samindanan wahanse athhala nisa un wahanse oba nasthi wi, wigasa wanasi yana thek obatath obe wadakatayuthu siyallatath sapaya da wiyawul da tharjana da pamunuwana seka. 21 oba ayithi karagannata yana deshayen oba nathi karadamana thek un wahanse wansagatha pita wasangatha obata pamunuwana seka. 22 samindanan wahanse kshaya ro‡∑ägaya saha una da idimuma saha unasannipathaya da obata walandenna salaswa pida karana seka.

padama kiyaladenna hitiye.ithin ape waradi adupadu harigassana gaman ape honda kiyannath ayiyala amathaka kale naha.aayemath iskolekata aawama ape pasal kale mathak wenawa.ekata hitiya yaluwo,un ekka natapu nadagam...me okkoma.mallila diha baluwamath ee kale apiwa mama eyala thulin dakka.ithin api kawuruth guruwarayekta wada,sahodarayek,sahodariyek kiyana hangimen thamayi kiyala dena eka kale.prathipalath sahena tharam sarthaka bawa sakayak naha.labuna paya 4 1/2 ka kalaya athule api godak loku wada kotasak kala.samahara nangila mallilata nirasa wela,therenne nathuwa thibuna padam kotas api saralawa,wihilu thahalu karana gamanma kiyala dunna.okkoma dewal kiyala denna nam kalaya kohethma madi.namuth ape uthsahaya ahaka nogiya bawa api danagaththe godak denek langatama awith "ayiye,thankyu mewa apita kiyala dunnata" wage dewal kiyapu nisa.hithata harima sathutak danenawa ehema kiyanakota.ara gaman mahansiyayi,nidimarapu wehesayi okkoma ee wachana tika ahanawath ekkama kohen giyada kiyala na.wibhage godadala amma,thaththage pathum ishta karanna podi ewuwanta hayiyak wenna labuna eka gana puduma santhosayak hithuna.mata ewele me kawiya mathak wune nikanma..."pahanin pahan siya gananak awuluwada epahan silehi alu adu nowa dilena leda...."api danna deyak thawath kenekta kiyala dunnata kawadawath thamunta haniyak wenne na,hondak misaka,mata eeka godakma hithata wadune kampas aapu mula kale oriyanteshan eken.kiyawana ayata podi upadesak denna hithuna,thamunta amaruyi wage hithena oona sabjekt ekak thamunge yaluwekta nikan kiyala dila balannako,aniwaryen kalin therunata wada wadiyen ee padama therewi.anika ehema kiyala denakota amuthuwen padam karanna oone na.ibema mathaka hitinawa.hari,oya widiyata lasthiwela giyata kalin apita wada tika iwarakarala enna siddhawuna.namuth hawas waruwe puja nagare tikak awidinnath api amathaka kale naha.ruwanwali saya langadi api kawuruwath ahapu nathi hari lassana bauddha katha,ithihasayen wagema dharmayenuth aragena apita kiyala dunne ape harsha,waruna,anil ayiya,kalum ayiya wagema madhawa ayiya.jethawanaramaya,jaya shri maha bodhiya wage thanwalata yannath apita puluwankama labuna.dawale oonatharam oya than wala giyath ra welawaka yanna labune palaweni sareta.harima lassanayi e wagema harima shanthayi.oya widiyata ithin loweth aathal aragaththa ape warkshop gamane awasanayedi api 19 wenida pandara 12.20 ta withara api anuradhapuren bas ekata nagala pandara 5.30 wage wenakota kotuwata aayeth aawa.aayeth ee wage gamanak yanna loku aasawak,wuwamanawak hithe thiyanawa,balamu,issaraha wada ekka ee adahasa sarthaka karaganna labeda kiyala....:)
